original_text: So the Lord said to Moses, “Take Joshua son of Nun, a man in whom is the spirit of leadership, and lay your hand on him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 눈의 아들 여호수아는 그 안에 영이 머무는 자니 너는 데려다가 그에게 안수하고

sentences.original_text: So the Lord said to Moses
a man in whom is the spirit of leadership
and lay your hand on him
